data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Rajgarh words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rajgarh, Madhya Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Rajgarh, Madhya Pradesh, India.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 17,004 believers in Rajgarh, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Rajgarh, Madhya Pradesh, India to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Teli Gangauta (Muslim traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Rajgarh, Madhya Pradesh, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,510,041, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.section_summary:
the county of Rajgarh, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 1,545,800.

We estimate Rajgarh has 17,004 people who might know Jesus, 18,756 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,510,041 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Rajgarh unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

location.name: Rajgarh
location.people_groups_list: Naita, Rajput Sendhu, Rajput Solanki, Brahmin Srigaud, Lodha (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Naita (56,000), Rajput Sendhu (27,000), Rajput Solanki (305,000), Brahmin Srigaud (99,000), Lodha (Muslim traditions) (4,100)
